intro.title: Hi, I'm Thomas
intro.content: Hey there! I'm Thomas Ansems and I hail from the Netherlands. As a senior Web developer, I get lost in my work and forget all about time because I love what I do! I also enjoy blending my passion for art and code by experimenting with new techniques and pushing boundaries.

content.title: Front-end Development
content.content: Since 2012 I have been working as a front-end developer. I love to build beautiful ui's and websites.

content.title: Front-end Engineering
content.content: Loving to continuously make UX better and better by using the latest technologies.

content.title: Javascript Developer
content.content: I love to work with Javascript and Typescript. I have a lot of experience with React, Next.js and Three.js.

content.title: What is next?
content.content: I'm always like to experiment and search for the latest opportunities in development. Newadays I am also interested in AI and Web3 development.
